Reviews.Title: Terrific value laptop!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny, it's a good internet and gaming computer.This is a great laptop for starters or teens.I purchased the laptop after my 9 year old laptop died. This was a great deal for the price and for what I need it for. Love the slick black color. Not a lot you can do with this other than play with it.I believe this laptop is as good as you will find for a budget laptop. It has 4GB of RAM, a 320GB hard drive, and excellent functionality. Some people may not be used to Windows 8 yet, like another person who reviewed it, but if you take the quick tutotial on Windows 8 online, you can easily adapt and find it's a very good computer. Overall: Good sound quality, A touch pad that works great, Perfect for Business, Big screen size, easy to set up, lightning fast!

Reviews.Title: Great product for daily usage.
Reviews.Author: decent user
Reviews.Content: This one is great for all the daily usage, but not powerful enough for gaming. We take advantage of it and purchased this product for our son as his first own laptop. So he could not use it to play 3D games but enough for web browsing, social networking and finishing home work. He like it. We suggest this product for any people who just need a laptop for daily usage. worth every penny

Reviews.Title: Good product with good price ! I love it
Reviews.Author: Good product with good price
Reviews.Content: Good product with good price ! I love it . You get a lot with this laptop after comparing prices at other retail stores.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: Lakeisha
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for my bf he loves it. He is pleased it came with windows 8 and the new microsoft 2013 program. It is great for watching movies on netflix, using microsoft word programs and listening to music.

Reviews.Title: perfect for college
Reviews.Author: chris keag
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my daughter who just started her first semester in college. She loves it and has no complaints. it's compact and does everyrthing she needs.

Reviews.Title: Perfect with Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a laptop to get me started. Just something to get around on the internet, check email, and store music and video. For the price of around 350$ this computer is amazing. I found that the harddrive is perfect for people that love music and movies like i do. The camera is a good one. Not amazing but still worth using. The laptop as not froze on me and runs at a very good speed. Takes only about 3 mins from a cold start to me being on the internet. The screen is plenty wide and a great size for music and video. The only downfall is the built in Windows 8 so i wouldn't recommend it to anyone in a gaming stand point but for everyone else youll learn how t use it and move through the interface in about a week.

Reviews.Title: Completely Underpowered Laptop
Reviews.Author: The Nickster
Reviews.Content: Ordered this machine for my wife not paying much attention to the chipset.  Now I did convert it to Windows 7 64bit, so perhaps it performs adequately running Win 8.x...but if you're thinking of falling back to Win7, stay away.  About 3/4 of the RAM is utilized just browsing the web...that's the OS and browser, not the machine...but performance is just abominable.  You can watch the CPU spike and stay that way for long periods just browsing or doing simple document editing.  Terrible.  This performance is on a clean install with major-maker antivirus running and nothing else.  Read reviews on this chipset outside of Amazon and you'll see what I mean.

Reviews.Title: HP Laptop
Reviews.Author: Eric H.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this specific unit, but I actually got a unit that had a 750 gig drive and a faster processor for the same price. The third party retailer emailed me saying the specifics in the ad were incorrect and offered this one. I am very happy with the unit. I'm not a power user, and this is perfect for what I do. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful machine
Reviews.Author: Maribel Mercado
Reviews.Content: This computer is great! I bought it for my dad as a birthday present and he really doesn't need alot of bells and whistles.  Just a standard machine that works great and wont freeze up on him.  He loves it and I do too, thank you.
